programme.title: Crimes, Cons & Capers
programme.sub-title: Crimes, Cons and Capers: Fundraising Scams
programme.desc: Crimes exploiting online generosity are a growing trend. These real-life stories show people going to great lengths to con unsuspecting donors out of their money.

programme.title: Ed & Day in The 'Burgh
programme.sub-title: Ed and Day in the 'Burgh: Nailing It In Carnegie
programme.desc: Ed and Day get competitive over a round of golf and learn a new twist on old fashion cocktail making before heading to Apis Meadery in Carnegie.

programme.title: Finding Adventure
programme.sub-title: Finding Adventure: Screens Off, Adventure On!
programme.desc: Camryn Simpson, a 21-year-old student at the University of Pittsburgh and ambassador on social media platforms can’t take time away from her phone. With the help of Kinga, Camryn will log-out of social media and log-in to the outdoors to find adventure.

programme.title: Eat Play Stay
programme.sub-title: Eat Play Stay: Spirited Adventure in Sheboygan, WI
programme.desc: Gear up for ghost hunting in an abandoned asylum, bring your appetite for brats, and belly-up to the bar at a saloon frequented by locals. Tour a bakery with nice buns, and end the day getting cozy in an A-frame.

programme.title: Wait, What Happened?
programme.sub-title: Wait, What Happened?: Are Those Hitchhiking Spiders?
programme.desc: Frank Nicotero is not at the zoo – but he does have some questions about wild animal stories to ask his Queen City contestants.

programme.title: Lost Innocence: The Tragedy of Harmony Montgomery
programme.sub-title: Lost Innocence: The Tragedy of Harmony Montgomery
programme.desc: A police investigation into a missing seven-year-old girl in Manchester, New Hampshire reveals harrowing details that shock the state. But even more disturbing is the discovery that the tragic outcome could have been avoided.

programme.title: Hometown Tragedy
programme.sub-title: Hometown Tragedy: The Toy Box Killer
programme.desc: One evening in 1999, Cythnia Jaramillo shows up at a home wearing nothing but a dog collar. She had been tortured and sexually assaulted for days. Her escape leads investigators to discover a gruesome string of kidnappings and murders.

programme.title: Hometown Tragedy
programme.sub-title: Hometown Tragedy: The Missing Paperboys
programme.desc: A 12-year-old paperboy's disappearance during his Sunday morning route shocks a peaceful Iowa city. Panic sets in when a second paperboy goes missing.

programme.title: Crimes, Cons & Capers
programme.sub-title: Crimes, Cons and Capers: Cops & Robbers
programme.desc: From a coffeeshop chain to snowy railroad tracks, these unconventional crime scenes bring the childhood game of Cops & Robbers to life.

programme.title: Local Love
programme.sub-title: Local Love: Escaping the Single Life at 49
programme.desc: After being divorced for 15 years Angelina is looking for love in all the right places in Sacramento with three local bachelors. But she’s going to have her work cut out for her as she goes bowling, talks classic cars and completes an escape room.

programme.title: Chaos & Kindness
programme.sub-title: Chaos and Kindness: Ryan Survives on Kindness in Music City
programme.desc: Justin sends Ryan on a thrilling musical journey in Nashville with just $20 and drumsticks to earn his ticket back home. On the scorching sidewalks of Music City, Ryan is humbled and uplifted by the generosity of those who have the least to give.

programme.title: Eat Play Stay
programme.sub-title: Eat Play Stay: Reasons to Smile in Dayton, OH
programme.desc: Step into the heartwarming charm of Dayton, Ohio! Cheer on the Dragons, step back in time to savor artisan ales and unwind at an exotic glamping retreat. The Gem City offers plenty of reasons to smile.

programme.title: What's On The Menu?
programme.sub-title: What's On The Menu, Pittsburgh?: Farm To Table
programme.desc: Sourcing high-quality, fresh ingredients can be a challenge in an urban area like Pittsburgh. Meet chefs and restaurant owners who are going the extra mile to serve up fresh farm-to-table cuisine.

programme.title: Ed & Day in The 'Burgh
programme.sub-title: Ed and Day in the ‘Burgh: Living It Up in Lawrenceville
programme.desc: Ed and Day explore the many sides of Lawrenceville. From sword fighting and thrifting to making wine and burgers, the guys experience the beauty of this eclectic neighborhood.

programme.title: Americas Most Delish
programme.sub-title: America's Most Delish Midwest: 10 Remix Dishes to Savor from the Midwest
programme.desc: Discover where classic dishes collide to create delightful flavors. From pizza debates to the Juicy Lucy to a good old-fashioned red beer, see how regional creativity transforms beloved foods into something more.

programme.title: My Perfect Day
programme.sub-title: My Perfect Day with Woman's Day: Special Olympics Champ Boogies Through Bucketlist
programme.desc: Chris has an unstoppable spirit, despite the challenges of Down syndrome. His resilience has propelled him to extraordinary achievements, including clinching the gold in Greece. Meaghan takes him on a whirlwind of experiences tailored just for him.

programme.title: Hometown Tragedy
programme.sub-title: Hometown Tragedy: Dark Family Secrets Unearthed in the Bible Belt
programme.desc: Growing up, two siblings hear unsettling stories about their family's history. They don't know what to believe about the ones who went missing in 1992, until, decades later, the haunting truth comes out.

programme.title: Plate It!
programme.sub-title: Plate It, Pittsburgh!: Catch of the Day
programme.desc: Chefs Nate Schoedel and Ivan Gil-Silva are casting their nets for the best Catch of the Day dishes in today's seafood showdown. Can our chefs reel in a victory? Or will they let the big one get away?

programme.title: Finding Adventure
programme.sub-title: Finding Adventure: DJ Goes In the Air Off the Air
programme.desc: DJ Jenelle “J.Belle” Vannoy is living her dream of working in radio. She worked all over the country before landing in Albuquerque. As the voice of the city but new to the area, her desire to learn more about Duke City has Jenelle ready for adventure.

programme.title: Boston Rob Does Beantown
programme.sub-title: Boston Rob Does Beantown: Axed in East Boston
programme.desc: Rob tests out all types of relaxation, from sound baths to flinging an axe, discovers exciting new cuisine and quenches his thirst in this diverse and hopping Boston ‘hood.

programme.title: Blind Kitchen
programme.sub-title: Blind Kitchen: Battle of the Titans
programme.desc: Renowned Chef and cookbook author Dave Becker of Sweet Basil & Juniper battles experienced competitor Eric LeBlanc of Red Heat Tavern. Will their vast culinary knowledge help one rise to the top or will the blindfold trip up these high end chefs?

programme.title: My Amazing Cheap Date
programme.sub-title: Cheap Date: Selfies and Sprouts
programme.desc: Fancy feasting, a walking city tour and a selfie paradise on two cheap dates in New Orleans.

programme.title: Wait, What Happened?
programme.sub-title: Wait, What Happened?: All Around The Wait, What Happened World
programme.desc: In this season's finale, Frank Nicotero finds a couple of good sports in New Orleans and Cincinnati. Watch as he revisits the most absurd moments from the first two seasons.

programme.title: Behind the Lens: A Storytellers Project
programme.sub-title: Episode 1
programme.desc: Join WGAL News 8's Anne Shannon for "Behind the Lens: A Storytellers Project," where we relive the best of 2024 through the eyes of our award-winning photojournalists.

programme.title: Crimes, Cons & Capers
programme.sub-title: Episode 1
programme.desc: Crimes, Cons & Capers explores some of the wildest headline-grabbing crimes and far-fetched escapades from across the country including bizarre love scams, high-speed car chases, risky prison breaks and more.

programme.title: Hometown Tragedy
programme.sub-title: Episode 1
programme.desc: A true crime series telling the story of unfathomable crimes that have rocked American communities leaving them forever changed.

programme.title: In Transit by Esquire
programme.sub-title: Episode 1
programme.desc: Host Dave Holmes meets celebrity guests at the airport bar to discuss must-do activities in cities across America. So when you’re ready to board your next flight, you’ll have an Esquire-approved itinerary.

programme.title: Heroes On Call
programme.sub-title: Heroes On Call: The Forgotten Story of America's First Paramedics
programme.desc: In the 1960s, Americans were dying at shocking rates due to inadequate emergency care. Enter Freedom House Ambulance Service: the first paramedics unit in the U.S., run and staffed by Black men and women. This is the origin story of EMS.

programme.title: WGAL Local News
programme.sub-title: Episode 1
programme.desc: Get the latest local news and weather from WGAL.

programme.title: Weathering the Storm
programme.sub-title: Weathering the Storm: Couple Faces Historic Tornado on Eve of Wedding
programme.desc: On December 10, 2021, a violent tornado outbreak hit western Kentucky. It was the deadliest weather event in the history of the Commonwealth. But as families faced a bleak holiday season, hope emerged in surprising ways.

programme.title: The Spark
programme.sub-title: Episode 1
programme.desc: From professional hockey players to award-winning muralists, The Spark highlights the craft, the journey, and the joy. These masters and thought leaders may have made names for themselves on the national stage, but they never forget the city that sparks their inspiration daily

programme.title: Ed & Day in The 'Burgh
programme.sub-title: Episode 1
programme.desc: Comedians, podcasters and craft beer enthusiasts Ed Bailey and Day Bracey explore hot spots, hidden gems and the best places to grab a cold brew in the 'Burgh.

programme.title: Blind Kitchen
programme.sub-title: Episode 1
programme.desc: Chefs recreate each other’s signature dish, but they can only determine what the dish is using their senses of taste, touch and smell. When the masks come off, the heat is on, with each chef attempting to cook their opponent’s creation.

programme.title: Eat Play Stay
programme.sub-title: Episode 1
programme.desc: Experience serious vacation vibes and discover some of the most special corners of America on this guided tour of must-visit cities.

programme.title: Ballin' in Baltimore
programme.sub-title: Episode 1
programme.desc: Join WNBA player and Olympian Angel McCoughtry as she shows us the people and places that put Baltimore on the map. From sailing the Chesapeake, to sampling street foods, McCoughtry pulls back the curtain on what makes the Charm City so special.

programme.title: Hit Me With Your Best Spot
programme.sub-title: Episode 1
programme.desc: No one knows a city like the locals who live there. This series taps into the insider knowledge of notable figures including musicians, athletes, chefs, artists, influencers, and others who share their best spots to hit up in the city.

programme.title: On The Job
programme.sub-title: Episode 1
programme.desc: Orlando expert, Brendan O'Connor, celebrates the people behind the scenes of the businesses that make Orlando a truly unique place. Join him as he rolls up his sleeves and receives hands on training while spending a day with them, On The Job.

programme.title: Local Love
programme.sub-title: Episode 1
programme.desc: One local single experiences some of the best their city has to offer on three blind dates. Our singles may spend three perfect days out on the town, but there can only be one love match. Who will be picked for a second date?

programme.title: Plate It!
programme.sub-title: Episode 1
programme.desc: Watch things heat up in the kitchen as two local chefs go head-to-head to create a three-course meal utilizing ingredients sourced from one of the city’s unique marketplaces.

programme.title: Eat Play Stay
programme.sub-title: Episode 1
programme.desc: Experience serious vacation vibes and discover some of the most special corners of America on this guided tour of must-visit cities.

programme.title: Wait, What Happened?
programme.sub-title: Episode 1
programme.desc: In this game show, comedian Frank Nicotero hits the streets to ask people questions inspired by the wildest news stories for a chance at winning a cash prize. These real-life stories with unreal outcomes will make you say, “Wait, What Happened?"

programme.title: What's On The Menu?
programme.sub-title: Episode 1
programme.desc: What's On The Menu?

programme.title: Stitch
programme.sub-title: Episode 1
programme.desc: Stitch showcases the feel-good and do-good that make up the fabric of America from inspiring tales of perseverance, to good Samaritans helping neighbors, to trailblazers improving their communities.

programme.title: Hometown Tragedy
programme.sub-title: Hometown Tragedy: Driven to Kill: The Twisted Plot to Murder a Florida Doctor
programme.desc: In a serene community, a beloved doctor is bludgeoned in her own home. Investigators uncover a conspiracy that rocks the close-knit neighborhood to its core​​.

programme.title: Sports Town Stories
programme.sub-title: Episode 1
programme.desc: Each episode of this documentary series features incredible sports stories from iconic American cities. From gritty underdog victories to passionate unlikely match-ups, the series proves that sports are so much more than a pastime.

programme.title: Local Love
programme.sub-title: Episode 1
programme.desc: One local single experiences some of the best their city has to offer on three blind dates. Our singles may spend three perfect days out on the town, but there can only be one love match. Who will be picked for a second date?
